sentence.Network_en: Jack is a wiseacre who hears the grass grow.
sentence.Network_cn: 杰克是个自作聪明的人,对什么事都非常敏感.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Middle Dutch wijsseggher 'soothsayer', probably from the Germanic base of wit. The assimilation to acre remains unexplained

means.word_mean: 1. an upstart who makes conceited, sardonic, insolent comments
